mapper.select: select t.id,t.name,t.age,t.update_date from t_student t order by t.update_date desc, t.age asc
mapper.insert: insert into t_student(id, name, age, update_date) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{age}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: update t_student set name = #{name}, age = #{age}, update_date = #{updateDate} where id = #{id}
